TestCase.name: testPartialPartitionFieldPredicatePushDown[sourceFetchPartitions=false, useCatalogFilter=false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE (id > 2 OR part1 = 'A') AND part2 > 1

LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(OR(>($0, 2), =($2, _UTF-16LE'A')), >($3, 1))]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[+($3, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[id, name, part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField], where=[((id > 2) OR (part1 = _UTF-16LE'A':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"))]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=2}, {part1=B, part2=3}]]], fields=[id, name, part1, part2])

Calc(select=[id, name, part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField], where=[((id > 2) OR (part1 = _UTF-16LE'A':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"))]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=2}, {part1=B, part2=3}]]], fields=[id, name, part1, part2])

TestCase.name: testSimplePartitionFieldPredicate1[sourceFetchPartitions=false, useCatalogFilter=false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE part1 = 'A'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'A')]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[+($3, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[id, name, CAST(_UTF-16LE'A':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE") AS part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=1}, {part1=A, part2=2}], project=[id, name, part2]]], fields=[id, name, part2])

TestCase.name: testUnconvertedExpression[sourceFetchPartitions=false, useCatalogFilter=false]
TestCase.Resource: select * from MyTable where trim(part1) = 'A' and part2 > 1

LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), _UTF-16LE' ', $2), _UTF-16LE'A'), >($3, 1))]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[+($3, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[id, name, part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=2}]]], fields=[id, name, part1, part2])

TestCase.Resource: select * from MyTable where trim(part1) = 'A' and part2 > 1

LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), _UTF-16LE' ', $2), _UTF-16LE'A'), >($3, 1))]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[+($3, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[id, name, part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[test_catalog, test_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=2}]]], fields=[id, name, part1, part2])

TestCase.name: testWithUdfAndVirtualColumn[sourceFetchPartitions=true, useCatalogFilter=false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE id > 2 AND MyUdf(part2) < 3

LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($0, 2), <(MyUdf($3), 3))]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], part1=[$2], part2=[$3], virtualField=[+($3, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[id, name, part1, part2, (part2 + 1) AS virtualField], where=[(id > 2)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[], partitions=[{part1=A, part2=1}, {part1=C, part2=1}]]], fields=[id, name, part1, part2])
